trans-unit.source: An old version of Isotope eCommerce has been detected on your installation. If you would update the database now, your existing customer data and configuration might be lost. To prevent this, the database update tools have been locked automatically.
There are multiple options to get your installation back:
Create a backup, then completely uninstall Isotope and remove all it's database tables and related extensions. Afterwards you can install Isotope eCommerce 2.0 again.
We are currently running a fundraising to develop an update tool. The more people that help, the sooner you will be able to update your old installation. Please consider participating.
Get an experienced Contao developer to migrate your data manually. We suggest to take a look at the Contao partner listing.
Visit our website for more information about Isotope eCommerce.
